text:
Brock Pierce (born November 14, 1980) is an American businessman and former child actor. He is known for his work in the cryptocurrency industry. As a child actor, he was in Disney movies "The Mighty Ducks" (1992), ' (1994), and "First Kid" (1996).
In 2000, he was accused of sexual abuse by three women.
In July 2020, Pierce announced his candidacy for President of the United States as an Independent candidate for the 2020 election.
